title: y rito
body:
so, as we all know, kindren was just released, so why are they pumping out illoui (know idea how to spell it)

is riot trying to improve gameplay, or just in it for the money

replies.body: a year ago erry1 complain about how long they wait for new champs. now u complain about 2 quick? plz noob

You don't know how to spell those champions names, yet you have access to a selection within the posting system that actually shows you how they're spelled?

It's not that you don't know, it's that you're lazy.
Since they basically destroyed this game with 5.22, I think they are just trying to cover up that fact.
Lol rito ruined everything this patch.
I know right? Seriously guys the patch is good it's just different. Plus the fact that this is PRE-SEASON. Meaning it's essentially a testing period. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
